name: Escape Room Experience
description:
This is my Escape room. You are locked in a secret lab that you discovered. You are able to escape, but a security mechanism has been tripped and you only have a short amount of time before the room will kill you.

Can you escape?

Please note that there is an issue with the camera meaning it can be quite buggy. Also, if you collide with a pillar it may make the camera spiral so try to avoid that.

Features:

Custom Audio, Visuals.

Two exciting and interactive puzzles.

Time attack - Can you escape before the time runs out?
